contentheadline.headline: File:Sudbury Neutrino Observatory.artist concept of detector.jpg

contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Information | Description = Artist's concept of the [[Sudbury Neutrino Observatory]] [[detector]] | Source = [http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/medium/publicity_photos/sno1.jpg]: [http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/ SNO IMages] | Date = | Author = Sudbury Neutrino Observatory | Permission = == Copyright status == [[SNO]] (publicity photo). [http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/ Copyright information] The above URL clearly states the copyright information. It is repeated below: ::''SNO Image Catalog'' ::''Click on any small image to enlarge in this frame. (images are duplicated in the frame to the left for your browsing convenience)'' ::''Conditions for reproduction of images from this catalog:'' ::* ''Credit must be given for each image used according to the comment for the image, or "Photo courtesy of SNO" if not specified.'' ::* ''An e-mail is sent to qusno@sno.phy.queensu.ca detailing the images used and the purposes.'' ::* ''Any additional conditions stated in the comments of the desired images must be obeyed.'' ::''Note: The image comment is displayed above the picture when you click on any thumbnail, and is embedded in the JPG or GIF file.'' | other_versions = }} <center><i><small> </small></i></center> {{CopyrightedFreeUseProvidedThat|[http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/ '''these restrictions are followed.''']}} == Source of image == Taken on March 13, 2004 from [http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/medium/publicity_photos/sno1.jpg]: [http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/sno/images/ SNO IMages] [[Category:Images of Greater Sudbury]] {{Copy to Wikimedia Commons|bot=ContinuityBot}}
